suggestions.reasoning: The icon depicts two angle‑bracket‑like triangles (representing code brackets) with a forward slash inside, so "code-brackets-slash" accurately describes the visual content and fits the development theme.

The icon depicts a battery with a lightning bolt inside, indicating charging. "battery-charge" directly describes this visual content and aligns with existing naming conventions in the Device category.

The icon shows a circular film reel with four holes and a small circle resembling a camera lens, indicating a movie camera. "movie-camera" accurately describes the visual content and fits the media category better than the generic or numbered name.

The icon displays a small grid of app-like circles (representing a collection of apps) with a star shape overlay, indicating a featured or highlighted set of apps. The name 'apps-grid-star' clearly describes this visual content.
